byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Chiappe's death expected to affect Syria-Lebanon situation; pub knew he planned to crush Free French movement and resume negotiations with Ital armistice comm; French Govt claims he was shot down by Brit plane
snippet: BEIRUT, Syria, Nov. 30 (delayed) --Jean Chiappe's death when his plane was shot down while he was flying here to assume his new post as French High Commissioner for Syria and Lebanon is bound to have an immediate effect on the situation there....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: SYRIANS SEE OMEN IN CHIAPPE'S DEATH; Know New Commissioner Was Sent to Crush 'Free French' in Mandated Territory

lead_paragraph: BEIRUT, Syria, Nov. 30 (delayed) --Jean Chiappe's death when his plane was shot down while he was flying here to assume his new post as French High Commissioner for Syria and Lebanon is bound to have an immediate effect on the situation there.
